title: Stay Hydrated
description: Drinking enough water daily keeps your skin and body healthy.
author: Dr. Lisa Brown

title: Get Enough Sleep
description: Quality sleep helps your body recover and boosts your mental health.
author: Dr. Alex White

title: Daily Exercise
description: Even light exercise like walking improves circulation and mood.
author: Dr. Sarah Green

title: Balanced Diet
description: Eating a variety of fruits and vegetables provides essential nutrients.
author: Dr. Michael Blue
